subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Luge Racing
Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: Despite warning signs and a drumbeat of concern conveyed by athletes and officials about the Whistler Sliding Centre track, Olympic and luge officials chose not to make radical changes.
snippet: Despite warning signs and a drumbeat of concern conveyed by athletes and officials about the Whistler Sliding Centre track, Olympic and luge officials chose not to make radical changes.
